text_logic_form: The length of line $PB$ is $12$ units.
The length of line $AB$ is $15$ units.
The measure of angle $ABD$ is $24$ degrees.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The length of line $PB$ is $12$ units.

diagram_logic_form: Point $P$ lies on the line connecting $C$ and $A$.
Point $P$ also lies on the line connecting $D$ and $B$.
line_instances: There are lines $CD$, $CA$, $CB$, $CP$, forming the rhombus $ABCD$ and its diagonals.
There are lines $DA$, $DB$, $DP$, forming the other half of the rhombus and its diagonals.
There are lines $AB$, $AP$, $BP$, forming the base of the rhombus and its diagonals.
